messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The station goal today is going to be for NO ONE to die

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Everyone turn your suit sensors on by right tapping your jumpsuit thi will help us locate you if you are hurt

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Transfer Centre.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There is a wild gorilla loose on the station please if you see it run far and run fast
